meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lynne Bongiovanni James Burns Jill Kaiser Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4371.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Lynne Bongiovanni, a college instructor from Queens, New York
James Burns, a television graphic designer from Avondale Estates, Georgia
Jill Kaiser, a trauma center registration secretary from Edgington, Illinois (whose 1-day cash winnings total $8,801)

tr.td: THE MISSOURI RIVER
COLORIFIC
MOVIE LOCATIONS
LAGER RHYTHMS
PUTIN
ON THE "ITZ"
